_description: Systemic events that affect the ENTIRE world simultaneously (Phase 2 - Axe 2)

systemic_events.title: Global Financial Meltdown
systemic_events.description: The collapse of the commercial real estate market triggers a global liquidity crisis. Markets plunge 40% in three weeks as major banks teeter on the brink.
systemic_events.description_fr: L'effondrement du marche immobilier commercial declenche une crise de liquidite mondiale. Les marches chutent de 40% en 3 semaines alors que les grandes banques vacillent.

systemic_events.title: Global Energy Crisis
systemic_events.description: A perfect storm of supply disruptions, geopolitical tensions, and infrastructure failures causes energy prices to triple. Industrial production grinds to a halt in many countries.
systemic_events.description_fr: Une combinaison de perturbations de l'offre, de tensions geopolitiques et de defaillances d'infrastructure fait tripler les prix de l'energie. La production industrielle s'arrete dans de nombreux pays.

systemic_events.title: New Pandemic Outbreak
systemic_events.description: A new highly transmissible variant emerges, overwhelming healthcare systems worldwide. International travel halts as countries close borders.
systemic_events.description_fr: Un nouveau variant hautement transmissible emerge, submergeant les systemes de sante du monde entier. Les voyages internationaux s'arretent alors que les pays ferment leurs frontieres.

systemic_events.title: Global Cyber Blackout
systemic_events.description: A sophisticated cyberattack cripples critical infrastructure across multiple continents. Power grids fail, banking systems crash, and communications are disrupted for days.
systemic_events.description_fr: Une cyberattaque sophistiquee paralyse les infrastructures critiques sur plusieurs continents. Les reseaux electriques tombent en panne, les systemes bancaires s'effondrent et les communications sont perturbees pendant des jours.

systemic_events.title: Global Trade System Breakdown
systemic_events.description: A cascade of trade wars and sanctions fractures the global trading system. Supply chains collapse as nations retreat into protectionism.
systemic_events.description_fr: Une cascade de guerres commerciales et de sanctions fracture le systeme commercial mondial. Les chaines d'approvisionnement s'effondrent alors que les nations se replient sur le protectionnisme.

systemic_events.title: AI Singularity Moment
systemic_events.description: A breakthrough in artificial general intelligence reshapes the global economy overnight. Tech leaders surge ahead while traditional industries struggle to adapt.
systemic_events.description_fr: Une percee en intelligence artificielle generale remodele l'economie mondiale du jour au lendemain. Les leaders technologiques prennent une avance decisive tandis que les industries traditionnelles peinent a s'adapter.

systemic_events.title: Nuclear Crisis Alert
systemic_events.description: A near-miss nuclear incident sends shockwaves across the globe. World leaders scramble to de-escalate as populations panic and markets crash.
systemic_events.description_fr: Un incident nucleaire evite de justesse envoie des ondes de choc a travers le monde. Les dirigeants mondiaux s'efforcent de desamorcer la situation tandis que les populations paniquent et les marches s'effondrent.

systemic_events.title: Climate Tipping Point Crisis
systemic_events.title_fr: Crise du point de bascule climatique
systemic_events.description: Simultaneous extreme weather events across the globe - floods, droughts, and storms - overwhelm emergency services and displace millions.
systemic_events.description_fr: Des evenements meteorologiques extremes simultanes a travers le monde - inondations, secheresses et tempetes - submergent les services d'urgence et deplacent des millions de personnes.

systemic_events.title: Space Race Breakthrough
systemic_events.description: A major space power achieves a significant milestone - permanent lunar base or asteroid mining - triggering a new era of space competition.
systemic_events.description_fr: Une grande puissance spatiale realise une etape majeure - base lunaire permanente ou exploitation miniere d'asteroides - declenchant une nouvelle ere de competition spatiale.

systemic_events.title: Global Food Crisis
systemic_events.description: Crop failures across multiple breadbasket regions trigger a global food crisis. Prices skyrocket as nations scramble to secure supplies.
systemic_events.description_fr: Des echecs de recoltes dans plusieurs regions grenier a ble declenchent une crise alimentaire mondiale. Les prix s'envolent alors que les nations se precipitent pour securiser les approvisionnements.
